Manifest.Name: Convenient PoP
Manifest.Description: This mod makes it so when you hit a PoP Soul Totem or a Wingsmould with your Nail it fills your Soul to full.

Manifest.Name: GoDump 1.5
Manifest.Description: Sprite dump

Manifest.Name: God Soul
Manifest.Description: A mod that makes the entire game really, really hard.

Manifest.Name: Momentum Knight
Manifest.Description: A mod for Hollow Knight which allows you to customize acceleration and friction values.

Manifest.Name: God Seeker +
Manifest.Description: Various tweaks to enhance your Godhome experience

Manifest.Name: EscapeHatch
Manifest.Description: Unfreeze game after exiting mod menu with f3

Manifest.Name: Player Data Tracker
Manifest.Description: Tracks player data. Most frequently used to display abilities/charms during Randomizer streams

Manifest.Name: Enemy Hit Info
Manifest.Description: Debug addon showing how many times you've hit the current enemy with different attack types

Manifest.Name: RemoveLaggyObjects
Manifest.Description: Removes objects that cause lag, such as Nailsage Sly's candles

Manifest.Name: CustomImage
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight Mod can change some sprites

Manifest.Name: DeathCounter
Manifest.Description: very cool death counter, yes

Manifest.Name: TheCurseofsly
Manifest.Description: A Hollow Knight Mod,make you can't get geo

Manifest.Name: FuryMod
Manifest.Description: A mod if you equipped Fury of Fallen,you will be 1 health and can use it

Manifest.Name: DisablePercent
Manifest.Description: Mod to stop showing % in the inventory menu, but will still show at the end. (Requires Vasi)

Manifest.Name: Player Data Tracker for 1.5
Manifest.Description: PDT ported and updated for 1.5. Used to show collected items in an OBS stream

Manifest.Name: HideModList
Manifest.Description: Replaces Mod names with "?????" in the corner of menus

Manifest.Name: RemoveLaggyObjections
Manifest.Description: Removes Sly's Candles from GodHome. Port of Mulhima's 1432 version.

Manifest.Name: VoidWalker
Manifest.Description: "Changes Pure Vessel in the following ways: ◆ Game is faster by 25%, ◆ Soul is limited, ◆ Health increased from 1600 to 2400, ◆ Begins in 3rd Phase right from the start, ◆ Cannot be staggered. Requires: Satchel(v0.7.4+) and DebugMod (v1.4.9.1+) Based on the unreleased mod of the same name by Aeraloth"

Manifest.Name: Exaltation
Manifest.Description: allows you to empower your charms by progressing through GodHome

Manifest.Name: Bonfire
Manifest.Description: A level-up system in Hollow Knight

Manifest.Name: Lightbringer
Manifest.Description: One of the first major Gameplay overhaul mods: Changes how the Knight attacks, as well as modifies many game aspects.

Manifest.Name: ModCommon (1578)
Manifest.Description: ModCommon ported to 1578 ಠ_ಠ (required for one port of AnyRad 1578 port)

Manifest.Name: Any Radiance (1578 port)
Manifest.Description: AnyRad for 1578 (Requires ModCommon1578)

Manifest.Name: Godly Nightmares (1578)
Manifest.Description: Godly Nightmares, ported to 1578

Manifest.Name: Pantheons Hit Counter
Manifest.Description: Counts hits in pantheons automatically.

Manifest.Name: Hit Counter
Manifest.Description: Hit Counter mod for Hollow Knight.

Manifest.Name: Hatchlings Mod
Manifest.Description: Various Weaverling convenience options, including # of, cosmetics, disabling attacks, and charm cost.

Manifest.Name: Companion Cloth
Manifest.Description: Let Cloth accompany and fight with you all the way

Manifest.Name: Health Share
Manifest.Description: Let some bosses use shared health and provides a health sharing API

Manifest.Name: Everwatchers
Manifest.Description: A mod boss based on Watcher Knights, allowing you to fight all of them simultaneously and add more of them

Manifest.Name: MultiZap
Manifest.Description: A mod where the Uumuu lightning attack follows the player through the entire game

Manifest.Name: PV Focus
Manifest.Description: Makes PV heal 25% when it does focus attack

Manifest.Name: Title Swapper
Manifest.Description: Allows the player to replace the Main Menu title with a custom one

Manifest.Name: Dumb Radiance
Manifest.Description: Changes the Radiance fight. This is a 1.5 port

Manifest.Name: Atomic Radiance
Manifest.Description: Changes Radiance fight. This is a 1.5 port

Manifest.Name: Ultimatium Radiance
Manifest.Description: Changes Radiance fight. This is a 1.5 port

Manifest.Name: IronHead Radiance
Manifest.Description: Changes Radiance fight. This is a 1.5 port

Manifest.Name: Enemy Randomizer [1.5 port]
Manifest.Description: Randomizes Enemies. This .zip comes with ModCommon1578, which is required to run this port.

Manifest.Name: Godhome Win Loss Tracker
Manifest.Description: Tracks per-boss win/loss in Hall of Gods and pantheons

Manifest.Name: Any Radiance (Satchel 1578 port)
Manifest.Description: Better AnyRad for 1578 (Requires Satchel)

Manifest.Name: Daughter of Hallownest (1.5 port)
Manifest.Description: Improved version of the Hornet 2 fight

Manifest.Name: Child of Light (1.5 Port)
Manifest.Description: A mod empowering players with radiant spell for those who seek the binding light that plagues our dreams.

Manifest.Name: Infinite AbsRad Phases
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes an Absolute Radiance phase infinite (5 does nothing). Requires SFCore and Satchel.

Manifest.Name: Change Start Location
Manifest.Description: Use menu changer page to add change start location to the options rando has. as a bonus it skips the opening cutscene. Requires Menu Changer

Manifest.Name: GPZ Precepts
Manifest.Description: Makes GPZ read out (no audio) a random precept each time he takes damage. During that time, he cannot be damaged again. Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Menderbug Options
Manifest.Description: Mod that lets you set Menderbug's spawn chance, choose whether Menderbug respawns after dying, and choose whether the sign must be broken. Requires Satchel.

Manifest.Name: Nailmaster's Pride
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes Nailmaster's Glory grant all Nail Arts, automatically charge Nail Arts, and prevent regular Nail attacks.

Manifest.Name: Nailmasters Damaged Only By Nail Arts
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes each Nailmaster only able to be damaged using their Nail Art. Sly can be damaged using all three.

Manifest.Name: Disable Enemy Geo
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes enemies no longer drop Geo. Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Always Furious
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes Fury of the Fallen benefit Nail slashes and Nail Arts at any HP. "ALL CHARMS END" (AbsRad, Radiance, and HK finales) will still cancel the effects. Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Dream Warpers
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes Gorb, Elder Hu, and No Eyes teleport 100% of the time after being damaged. Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Quick Focus + Hiveblood
Manifest.Description: Small mod that adds interaction between Quick Focus and Hiveblood. Requires SFCore

Manifest.Name: Spell Twister Focus (Normal)
Manifest.Description: Spell Twister reduces the cost of Focus. Requires SFCore

Manifest.Name: Spell Twister Focus (Faster)
Manifest.Description: Spell Twister reduces the cost of and increases the speed of Focus. Requires SFCore

Manifest.Name: Silent Dreamshield
Manifest.Description: A mod that makes Dreamshield not play audio when Nail slashing. Require SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Faster Hiveblood
Manifest.Description: A mod that makes Hiveblood restore Masks twice as fast (does not affect the Joni's Blessing Mask restoration rate). Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Grimmchild Everywhere
Manifest.Description: Allows Grimmchild to appear during the Troupe Master Grimm and Nightmare King Grimm fights. Does NOT work in the Troupe Master Grimm fight in Dirtmouth. Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Heavy Blow Damage
Manifest.Description: Increases Damage by 15% when Heavy Blow is equipped

Manifest.Name: Spell Damage Control
Manifest.Description: Allows the user to adjust some of the values for spells. You must launch the game with the mod at least once, and then edit the Global Settings file while the game is closed.

Manifest.Name: Fast Nail
Manifest.Description: Allows the player to swing their nail, *very* fast.

Manifest.Name: Pure Vessel Focus
Manifest.Description: Makes Pure Vessel heal 25% when Focusing

Manifest.Name: Grubsong Damage Scaling
Manifest.Description: Mod that makes the amount of SOUL restored by Grubsong / Grubsong + Grubberfly's Elegy scale with the amount of damage taken.

Manifest.Name: DumbMod
Manifest.Description: The Knight, All NPCs, and All Enemies are invisible

Manifest.Name: Uumuu Plus
Manifest.Description: Buffed Uumuu. Requires HKTool

Manifest.Name: Hunter's Journal Setter
Manifest.Description: Gives all Journal Entries upon collecting the Hunter's Journal

Manifest.Name: Radiance Contact Hitbox
Manifest.Description: Adds Contact Damage to Radiance

Manifest.Name: TitleSwapper - AX2U Start Streaming
Manifest.Description: Swaps the game title asset

Manifest.Name: Title Swapper - Soviet Edition
Manifest.Description: Swaps the menu title

Manifest.Name: Yeet Attack
Manifest.Description: Disabled regular Nail Slashes: Only Nail Arts can be used

Manifest.Name: Eternal Grubs
Manifest.Description: A mod that makes it so that Grubfather never eats the Grubs. Requires SFCore.

Manifest.Name: Carefree Melody High Chance
Manifest.Description: Makes Carefree Melody have the 90.9090% chance every time

Manifest.Name: Carefree RNG Reset
Manifest.Description: Sets Carefree Melody to highest chance in Hall of Gods

Manifest.Name: Boss Control Mod
Manifest.Description: Allows the player to play as some Bosses, including Radiance, The Hollow Knight, Grimm, Nail Master. English Translation of page: https://github-com.translate.goog/WLLEGit/HollowKnightMod?_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=en&_x_tr_hl=en&_x_tr_pto=wapp

Manifest.Name: Manhunt Mods
Manifest.Description: "AKA ""MP_ mods"" A series of mods that each do one specific thing, to be used when playing Multiplayer Games"
